item.title: Drag and Drop libraries in React.js
item.description: Image Credits:Â Maria Teneva In the world of React.js, there are some really amazing drag and drop libraries. Some of the popular ones are: react-dnd react-beautiful-dnd react-draggable dragula I recently had to look through the wild and decide which drag and drop library works best for our use-cases. After skimming through the APIs and the github pages of some of the popular libraries, I decided to explore and play around with react-dnd and react-beautiful-dnd.
